description.ko: 황금빛 돌 속에 보존된 살아있는 유산, 빛의 맥박을 통해 흐르는 대자연의 호흡.
description.en: A living legacy preserved in golden stone, where the breath of nature flows through glowing veins of light.

prompt: A colossal, ancient root system made of glowing bioluminescent fiber-optics encased within a massive, suspended amber sphere. The core pulses with liquid light in shades of #7FB069 and #FFE66D, illuminating microscopic spores floating in the surrounding dark, underwater-like atmosphere. The texture of the amber is weathered with deep age-cracks, showing intricate subsurface scattering where the interior light meets the surface. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution. Features volumetric light shafts, global illumination reflecting off the mossy ground below, and cinematic lighting that emphasizes the organic, breathing flow of the roots.
